General.Name: Public Joint Stock Company Kostroma Power Sale Company RUB0.04 PRF(USD)
General.Description: Publichnoe Akcionernoe Obshestvo Kostromskaya Sbytovaya Compania is involved in the supply of electricity to consumers in Russia. The company engages in the wholesale and retail of electricity in the Kostroma region. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Kostroma, Russia. Publichnoe Akcionernoe Obshestvo Kostromskaya Sbytovaya Compania operates as a subsidiary of Rusenergocapital Management Company.
